message.content: {"id": "17894", "title": "Bug 17894: Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults", "description": "When going to the Workbench preferences and changing the Open Mode to Single Click and selecting both checkboxes, clicking on 'Restore Defaults' does not revert the Open Mode to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.", "OB": "Open Mode is set to Single Click and both checkboxes are selected.", "EB": "Open Mode should be set to Double Click and both checkboxes should be cleared.", "SR": "Verify that clicking on 'Restore Defaults' reverts the Open Mode to Double Click and clears both checkboxes."}

origin.input_content:
